#define stricmp ( str1,
str2   )     strcasecmp( str1, str2)

Case insensitive string compare.

Parameters:
str1 First string to compare
str2 Second string to compare

Provides a wrapper to strcasecmp, for multiplatform issue.

Note:
Non Windows systems only
